name: material-symbols-class
description: material-symbols implementation to use them with classes
author: Joel Corrales <joel.corrales@super7ui.com>

scripts.build:css:min: npm copy:fonts && sass --style compressed --no-source-map --no-error-css material-symbols.scss:material-symbols.min.css outlined.scss:outlined.min.css rounded.scss:rounded.min.css sharp.scss:sharp.min.css index.scss:index.min.css
